  • Uses of Type in edu.citadel.cprl

    Subclasses of Type in edu.citadel.cprl 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ArrayType
    This class encapsulates the language concept of an array type in the programming language CPRL.

    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl that return Type 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Type ArrayType.getElementType()
    Returns the element type for this array type.
    static Type Type.getTypeOf​(Symbol literal)
    Returns the type of a literal symbol.
    Type Parser.parseTypeName()
    Parse the following grammar rule:
    typeName = "Integer" | "Boolean" | "Char" | typeId .
    Constructors in edu.citadel.cprl with parameters of type Type 
    Constructor Description
    ArrayType​(java.lang.String typeName, int numElements, Type elementType)
    Construct an array type with the specified name, number of elements, and the type of elements contained in the array.

    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl.ast that return Type 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Type Declaration.getType()
    Returns the type of this declaration.
    Type Expression.getType()
    Returns the type of this expression.
    Type NamedDecl.getType()
    Returns the type of this named declaration.
    Methods in edu.citadel.cprl.ast with parameters of type Type 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected void AST.emitLoadInst​(Type t)
    Emits the appropriate LOAD instruction based on the type.
    protected void AST.emitStoreInst​(Type t)
    Emits the appropriate STORE instruction based on the type.
    protected boolean AST.matchTypes​(Type t1, Type t2)
    Returns true if the two types are assignment compatible.
    void Declaration.setType​(Type type)
    Sets the type for this declaration.
    void Expression.setType​(Type exprType)
    Sets the type of this expression.
    Constructors in edu.citadel.cprl.ast with parameters of type Type 
    Constructor Description
    ArrayTypeDecl​(Token typeId, Type elemType, ConstValue numElements)
    Construct an ArrayTypeDecl with its identifier, element type, and number of elements.
    ConstDecl​(Token identifier, Type constType, Token literal)
    Construct a ConstDecl with its identifier, type, and literal.
    Declaration​(Token idToken, Type type)
    Construct a declaration with its identifier token and type.
    Expression​(Type exprType, Position exprPosition)
    Construct an expression with the specified type and position.
    InitialDecl​(Token identifier, Type declType)
    Construct an InitialDecl with its identifier and type.
    ParameterDecl​(Token paramId, Type type, boolean isVarParam)
    Construct a parameter declaration with its identifier, type, and a boolean value that indicates if it is a variable parameter declaration.
    SingleVarDecl​(Token identifier, Type varType, ScopeLevel scopeLevel)
    Construct a SingleVarDecl with its identifier, type, and scope level.
    VarDecl​(java.util.List<Token> identifiers, Type varType, ScopeLevel scopeLevel)
    Construct a variable declaration with its list of identifier tokens, type, and scope level
